page.title: 09Cannington's Orchestra
page.content: I belong to a music club in Cannington. It is called the Cannington Children's Orchestra.It is run by two music teachers.One is a piano teacher and the other teaches the violin.Here is a list of the instruments in the orchestra: Flute,Clarinet,different sizes of Recorders,Violins,Chime Bars and Piano.We meet on a Thursday at school at 5.30pm for one hour.Our latest piece is called "Winter".My favourite piece is called "The Old Woman and the Pedlar".In October we are playing in the Taunton Music Festival.Then nearer to Christmas we are playing to people at school for the Parent Teacher Association.
